mapper.select: select p.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, i.inquiry_answer from tbl_post p join tbl_inquiry i on p.id = i.id where p.id = #{id}

select i.id, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_status, m.member_nickname, m.kakao_email, m.member_email, p.created_date, p.updated_date from tbl_inquiry i join tbl_post p on i.id = p.id join tbl_member m on p.member_id = m.id order by p.created_date desc limit #{pagination.startRow}, #{pagination.rowCount};
